home.title: TG MiniApp Example
home.description: Its simple repo that may be used as start point for your project. Template uses VueJs as base js framework, also here is a ui lib and simple icon pack, for simpler usage experience this template we choose PocketBase as go backend framework. Lib for communicate with TelegramApi: PyTelegramBotApi
home.hint: For check status of api we may open setting tab by button on dock or click on the button

need_auth.title: Not in Telegram
need_auth.hint: Please open this app inside Telegram Mini App

not_found.hint: The page you are trying to access does not exist

popup.text: Please update app by clicking here!
